issue.title: [Developer] Only suggest cpp-* fix versions when merging Parquet patches
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7351](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7351). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The default fix version (1.11.0) for Parquet issues is resulting in the wrong fix version being set sometimes when committers merge PARQUET-\* patches. Since we only have C++ Parquet issues, I think we can safely only suggest the cpp-\* fix versions

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7351?focusedCommentId=16991973) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5998
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5998>
